text: Tajikistan has its system of football leagues. There are four levels of football leagues in Tajikistan. {| class="wikitable" border="1" | width="75" align="center"|Level | colspan="7" align="center"|Leagues |- | align="center" style="background:#efefef" |1 | colspan="7" align="center" |Tajikistan Higher League 8 clubs |- | align="center" style="background:#efefef" |2 | colspan="7" align="center" |Tajikistan First League 12 clubs |- | rowspan="4" align="center" style="background:#efefef" |3 | colspan="5" align="center" style="background:#efefef"| Tajikistan Second League |- | width="120" align="center" | Dushanbe | width="120" align="center" | Sughd Region | width="120" align="center"| Khatlon Region | width="120" align="center"| Districts of Republican Subordination | width="120" align="center" | Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous Region |- | rowspan="4" align="center" style="background:#efefef" |4 | colspan="5" align="center" style="background:#efefef"| Tajikistan Regional Leagues |- | width="120" align="center" | Dushanbe | width="120" align="center" | Sughd Region | width="120" align="center"| Khatlon Region | width="120" align="center"| Districts of Republican Subordination | width="120" align="center" | Gorno- Badakhshan Autonomous Region |- |- | rowspan="4" align="center" style="background:#efefef" |5 | colspan="7" align="center" | Tajikistan city and district Championships |} == External links and sources== * Tajikistan Football League Organization official website * Tajikistan Football Federation official website * В ДОБРЫЙ ПУТЬ, ЧЕМПИОНАТ ТАДЖИКИСТАНА-2017! title: Football league system in Tajikistan
